title: Tekken 7 - Deluxe Edition [Update 2 + ALL DLCs]
description:
Released: 2 Jun. 2017
Genre: Action, Sports
Developer: BANDAI NAMCO Studios Inc.
Language: RUS | ENG
Voice Language: ENG

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
Operating system: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz or equivalent
Operating system memory: 6 GB
Video card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB, GTX 750Ti 2GB, or equivalent (DirectX: Version 11)
Sound device: compatible with DirectX 11
Free space on hard disk: 60 GB

Release info:
Based on the Steam-Rip from Haoose
Do not cut / Do not recoded
Game archives are not opened
Installed [Update 2]
Unlocked all DLCs
Installation time 30 minutes on the HDD (Depends on the computer)

Game Features:
Incredibly entertaining fights. Almost photorealistic graphics and eye-popping visual effects - thanks to the latest technology of Unreal Engine 4, the long-awaited seventh release of the popular lineup has become the most beautiful game in the TEKKEN series.
More than 30 characters to choose from. Among the more than three dozen fighters there are veterans and beginners alike. And each - a huge list of techniques, opening the player an absolute freedom in choosing the style of combat.
Guest from the series Street Fighter - Akuma. The character of the famous 2D-fighting game Street Fighter is perfectly inscribed in three dimensions Tekken and retained all of its proprietary techniques.
The finale of the bloody history of the Mishima clan. TEKKEN 7 will be the last chapter in the saga of the Mishima clan, which has lasted 20 years. Be a witness of how the heroes reduce old scores and fight for control of the empire, regardless of anything or anyone ...

How to install
Mount and Install
Play and Enjoy
